CreditLine: Gift of Mrs. David M. Levy
Keywords: Another of the social causes of the migrants' leaving was that at times they did not feel safe
or it was not the best thing to be found on the streets late at night
They were arrested on the slightest provocation
\ufeffTitle: Another of the social causes of the migrants' leaving was that at times they did not feel safe, or it was not the best thing to be found on the streets late at night. They were arrested on the slightest provocation
